The dative clitic cross-references the X argument, also marked by the preposition “na”.

If the Y argument is a pronoun, the verb still requires the use of the preposition “na”, and not the dative clitic, cf. “Петър прилича на нея”. The same verb in the meaning "pass to, match" is used in the SBJ_DAT(na) patern
With pronominal Y arguments, the verb allows for the use of the dative clitic along with the preposition “na”, cf. “Петър й вярва” along with “Петър вярва на нея”.
